name: VRFD20
description: This is only an example implementation and not necessarily suitable for mainnet. A Chainlink VRF consumer which uses randomness to mimic the rolling of a 20 sided dice.

eventDecorators.name: DiceLanded
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when an ownership transfer request is accepted by the pending owner.

eventDecorators.name: DiceRolled
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when an ownership transfer request is accepted by the pending owner.

functionDecorators.name: house
functionDecorators.description: Get the house assigned to the player once the address has rolled.

functionDecorators.name: rollDice
functionDecorators.description: Requests randomness. Warning: if the VRF response is delayed, avoid calling requestRandomness repeatedly as that would give miners/VRF operators latitude about which VRF response arrives first.You must review your implementation details with extreme care.
